Body:
c = [45, 50, 55]
img = np.zeros((len(c), 100), dtype=float)
x = np.arange(100)
sig = 5.0
for i, _c in enumerate(c):
    img[(i), :] = (erf((x - c[i] + 0.5) / np.sqrt(2) / sig) - erf((x - c[i] -
        0.5) / np.sqrt(2) / sig)) / 2.0
mu, mue, flag = moment.moment1d(img, 50, 40.0, row=0, order=[0, 1, 2],
    bounds=([0.9, -1.0, 4], [1.1, 1.0, 6]))
assert mu[1] == 50.0 and flag[1]
